Spandana Appalaneni 
E-mail: Spandanak0808@gmail.com 
Mobile # (281)974-8113 
 
Quality Assurance Professional with experience in ensuring quality of software projects and 
processes. Proficient in QA testing methodologies and Agile Software Development Life Cycle. 
Skilled in creating comprehensive test plans, executing test cases, and collaborating with cross-
functional teams to complete testing. Strong ability to adapt to new environments and meet 
deadlines, with knowledge in Health care, Medical Device, and Claims Domain. Experienced in 
coordinating with stakeholders to understand requirements and implementing software test 
plans to verify user requirements.

Traceability Matrix (RTM) and other Test artifacts based on requirements and design

Testing Life Cycle(STLC)

documents in accordance with accepted test methodologies. 
➢ Engaged in QA, UAT(User Acceptance Testing) and Production environments.

➢ Extensive experience exceeding Web testing, cross-browser testing, Mobile and

➢ Proficiency in SQL Querying. Hands-on experience with JIRA and Zendesk.

Technical Skills 
▪ SDLC Methodologies : Agile, Waterfall

UNIVERSITY, Hyderabad, India.

Elevance Health, TN                                                                                         Jan 2022 – Present 
Role: IT Quality Control Analyst Sr.  
 
Oversaw diverse Health Care programs, including Home Health Services, Post Acute Care 
Facilities (Medicare Advantage and Commercial), Wound Care Connect, and Durable Medical 
Equipment Services, utilizing Provider Portal. Designed for Providers, Physicians, and Hospitals, 
Provider Portal facilitates submission of authorizations for users who are homebound, in post-
acute facilities, or acquiring tools under various Health Plans (tenants) like Anthem, Aetna, 
Humana, UHC, and Regence. This system caters to a vast network of customers spread across 
different states in the USA. 
 
• Worked on various Elevance Health programs, including Home Health Services, Post Acute 
Care Facilities (Medicare Advantage and Commercial), Wound Care Connect, and Durable

• Worked on various Elevance Health programs, including Home Health Services, Post Acute 
Care Facilities (Medicare Advantage and Commercial), Wound Care Connect, and Durable 
Medical Equipment,SDoH Services. Played an integral role in these projects, actively 
contributing from the initial discussion phase to the product release, ensuring alignment 
with customer expectations. 
• Participated in Sprint Planning, Refinements with BA’s, Scrum Master, Dev’s on different 
products to understand and gather the requirements from the end user 
• Developed test scenarios and test cases based on requirements and user stories provided 
by the BA/Product Owner. Successfully executed these test cases using Azure Boards. 
• Extensive practical exposure to automated testing tools such as Selenium and JavaScript. 
•  Proficient in API Testing using Postman for both Get and Post Methods. 
• Executed diverse tasks such as functional testing,Regression testing, Smoke testing, User

•  Proficient in API Testing using Postman for both Get and Post Methods. 
• Executed diverse tasks such as functional testing,Regression testing, Smoke testing, User 
acceptance testing, and end-to-end testing on the Provider Portal across various Programs 
in QA, Staging, and Production Environments. 
• Upon the deployment of the build into the Production environment, conducted both 
smoke and regression testing to ensure the system's stability and functionality. 
• Created Defects on Azure boards and followed up with the Dev’s until the fix is ready and 
retested those fixes. 
• Manually performed backend testing by executing SQL queries. 
• Executed Automation Test suite developed with Selenium.  
• Revised,  managed,  and  promoted  Test  Scripts,  submitting  them  to  Configuration 
Management for version control.

State of Tennessee Claims Dept, TN                                                                Jan 2021 – Jan 2022 
Role: Software Quality Assurance Engineer

Managed creation and execution of test scenarios based on requirements and user stories 
provided  by  Scrum  Master,  Product  Owner,  and  business  analysts.  Oversaw  test  case 
management  and  planning  in  every  sprint,  encompassing  various  types  of  tests  such  as 
exploratory, functional, regression, and smoke tests. Conducted rigorous database testing using 
MySQL to ensure data integrity and consistency.Worked with SNAP (Supplemental Nutrition 
Assistance Program), TANF (Temporary Assistance for Needy Families), Medicaid, Child Care 
Assistance and Housing Assistance Programs. 
• Created and executed test scenarios based on requirements and user stories created by 
Scrum Master, Product Owner and business analysts. 
• Responsible for test case management and planning in every sprint which covers many 
aspects of tests such as exploratory tests, functional tests, regression tests, smoke tests 
etc.

• Responsible for test case management and planning in every sprint which covers many 
aspects of tests such as exploratory tests, functional tests, regression tests, smoke tests 
etc. 
• Database testing of various complex queries using MySQL to check integrity and 
consistency of data. 
• Work with various developers and architects to provide continuous feedback on 
software usability and functionality. 
• Responsible for ensuring if testing is going hand in hand with software development in 
all phases. 
• Worked closely with design assurance, quality systems and regulatory teams to achieve 
company goals. 
• Tested and debugged the Application and Application data in various stages and various 
Test Environments for each build as we continue progressing and transitioning the 
system based on various regions. 
• Assisted  in  User  Acceptance  Testing  (UAT),  developing  and  maintaining  quality 
procedures, and ensuring that appropriate documentation is in place.

VACO Consulting Agency, TN                                                                       April 2020 – Jan 2021 
Role: Software Quality Assurance Engineer       
 
Conducted  requirement  analysis,  facilitated client  interactions  from  project  initiation  to 
completion, and prepared comprehensive test documents including Test Effort Estimation, 
Requirements Traceability Matrix (RTM), Test Plan, and End of Test Reports for User Acceptance 
Testing (UAT). Provided support to business team during UAT and performed data setup, test

Requirements Traceability Matrix (RTM), Test Plan, and End of Test Reports for User Acceptance 
Testing (UAT). Provided support to business team during UAT and performed data setup, test 
scenario preparation, and test case execution.

• Requirement gathering and analysis. 
• Interaction with client from Project Initiation phase until Project completions. 
• Preparing the test documents which includes Test Effort Estimation, RTM, Test plan and 
• End of Test Reports for UAT. 
• Business team support during UAT. 
• Data Setup, Test Scenarios preparation, Test case execution. 
• Detected and reported bugs and shortcomings uncovered during testing, documenting 
them for review by the relevant product team. 
• Developed and maintained documentation outlining processes and procedures for the 
quality assurance (QA) process of technical and infrastructure systems. 
• Operated in executing test cases to test the application functionality against the 
requirements manually. 
• Coordinated with business users and business analysts to understand requirements. 
• Performed quality assurance review and reporting activities to ensure contract metrics 
are met.

• Performed independent dispute resolution review and payment adjudication activities

Infotech Solutions LLC, Hyderabad                                                             Dec 2014 – Nov 2019 
Role: Software Analyst 
 
Monitored program performance and provided technical support during software installation    
and configuration. Conducted initial debugging procedures and provided feedback to developers 
on software usability and functionality.   
• Develop or specify standards, methods, or procedures to determine product quality or 
release readiness. 
• Monitor program performance to ensure efficient and problem-free operations. 
• Install and configure recreations of software production environments to allow testing 
of software performance.

• Monitor program performance to ensure efficient and problem-free operations.

• Perform initial debugging procedures by reviewing configuration files, logs, or code 
pieces to determine breakdown source. 
• Provide feedback and recommendations to developers on software usability and
